EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-09-18-EMEA-Customer-Summit.Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: You're invited: Turbonomic Customer Summit (18 September: Park lane, London)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/emea-customer-summit/#]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
To say thank you for being one of our customers we I would like to invite you to attend our 2018 Customer Summit on 18th September at the Intercontinental Park Lane, London, UK. Together with our other customers you will be able to learn more about Turbonomic, and what's coming in the future. See how other customers have used Turbonomic to increase efficiency and assure performance in their datacenter, and hear how you can achieve the same results in your hybrid cloud as well. There are guest speakers from Microsoft and Engage ESM with more to be announced soon. We hope that you will join us as we discuss the latest challenges in hybrid cloud estates and learn what to expect in the next release of the Turbonomic platform. The event is Free to attend, refreshments will be provided throughout the day with an exclusive business lunch provided in private at Ella Canta <[[https://www.ellacanta.com]]> by executive chef Martha Ortiz.
2018 Turbonomic Customer Summit Where: Intercontinental Park Lane <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/InterContinental+London+Park+Lane/@51.5039124,-0.1502709,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0xc31acd183fc31a5f?sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi03M2v1f3cAhUFWxoKHYkuC6sQ_BIwCnoECAsQCw]]>, London Tuesday, 18th September 2018 <[[https://turbonomic.com/emea-customer-summit/#]]> <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/aws-summit-vip-dinner-registration-44365454268]]>
As seats are limited we do ask that you please RSVP here <[[https://turbonomic.com/emea-customer-summit/#]]>.
We hope to see you there,
Your friends at Turbonomic
